<!-- # Get List of Reports -->

```{r get-list-old-reports}
#print(getwd())
filedir <- file.path("~/R/databaray-analytics/old_weekly_reports")
#print(dir.exists(filedir))
report_files <- list.files(filedir, pattern = "*.html")
#print(report_files)
```

```{r create-links}

old_report_files <- report_files %>%
  mutate(., url = paste0("https://gilmore-lab.github.io/databrary-analytics/old_weekly_reports/", report_files))

old_report_urls <- paste0("https://gilmore-lab.github.io/databrary-analytics/old_weekly_reports/", report_files)



```
